ComicInfo.Summary: Resurgence [Part 1]: The USS Resolute is pulled from a scientific survey mission and assigned to a new mission, to rescue Federation warp technology expert Dr. Leah Brahms who has disappeared and is feared to be captured by the hostile Talarians.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 10:30:42. [CVDB955509] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 15:07:56. [Issue ID 2451721]
